title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 56.3 - Filing of test information and materials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 56.3 - Filing of test information and materials

State Regulations
(a) On or before January 15, 1980, and the
15th day of each subsequent testing year used by the sponsor, the sponsor shall
file with the Commissioner of Education: (1)
a list of the names of such sponsor's standardized tests and/or tests, as such
terms are defined in section
340
(1)
of the Education Law; (2)
the beginning and ending dates of the
test year used by the sponsor; (3)
a calendar of the regularly scheduled administration dates and anticipated
score release dates for such administrations during the test year; (4)
a copy of each general publication
prepared for routine distribution to test subjects; and
(5)
a list of the specific duties required
for compliance with the provisions of article 7-A of the Education Law which
the sponsor wishes to delegate to another agent. The names and addresses of
such agent or agents shall be specified. (b) Background reports and statistical data, required to be filed with the Commissioner of Education pursuant to section
341
(1)
of the Education Law, shall be filed
within 30 days after preparation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
56.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
